entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
